content: lady bug amigurumi pattern by heliinä swerdlyk materials gauge and finished size cid 57 small amounts of worsted weight yarn in black and red cid 57 4 mm crochet hook us g/6 gauge is not important just make sure you use a crochet hook sized to make it cid 57 2 safety eyes or buttons for eyes 5-7mm tight enough so the stuffing doesn t cid 57 small amount of black felt poke or show through cid 57 1 black pipe cleaner cid 57 polyfill stuffing the lady bug is about 3 5 inches long and 2 5-3 inches tall when complete cid 57 craft glue not including his or her little antennae cid 57 black thread either regular or preferably embroidery cid 57 sewing needle abbreviations in loop = in the magic_ring single_crochet = single_crochet st or sts = stitch es decrease single_crochet decrease insert hook into st and draw up a loop insert hook into next st and draw up a loop yarn over draw through all 3 loops on hook invdec invisible decrease like a regular decrease decrease but work through the front loops only insert hook into front loop only of next stitch and draw up a loop insert hook into front loop only of next stitch and draw up a loop yarn over and pull through all 3 loops on hook makes your decreases prettier magic_ring / loop i start all my amigurumi s with an adjustable loop as opposed to working into a chained stitch you can tighten this loop so that there is no hole in the center of your work if you are unfamiliar with this just google crochet tutorial adjustable loop here are 3 tutorial sources that are each just as good as the other magic_ring tutorial at stitch diva http //www stitchdiva com/custom aspx id=54 at crochetme http //crochetme com/dec_jan_0405/reads_round html at planet june for right handed craftsters http //www planetjune com/blog/tutorials/magic-ring-right-handed/ and for left handed craftsters http //www planetjune com/blog/tutorials/magic-ring-left-handed/ notes 1 all rounds are worked continuously in a spiral do not join or turn at the end of row 2 to help keep track of your stitches instead of counting it may be helpful to place a stitch marker at the beginning of each round ©heliinä swerdlyk www heliina com please note that this project contains small parts that are not suitable for small children it s not meant as a toy for babies or small children body with red start with an adjustable loop round 1 6 single_crochet in loop round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around - 12 scs round 3 *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around - 18 scs round 4 *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 single_crochet repeat from * around - 24 scs round 5 *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 single_crochet repeat from * around - 30 scs round
